page.title: 18Recreation and Leisure
page.content: Most evenings some older children from East Leake come to the{playing {field}behind Costock School to{break {dance}and play{football}and younger children join in.Sometimes we play{ {tennis}on the{school playground.}The girls and some boys play on the{ {bars,horse,climbing frame,swings}and{ {slide,}at the top of the{school field. Some children don't come to the playing field,they just play with each other at their own houses.Children from Costock Primary School often play {cricket}in the summer. Many people go{horse riding}down country lanes,in Bunny Woods and at Bunny and Rempstone Riding Stables.A few people go on{caravan rallies}at weekends.Others go{boating}or{canoeing on the nearby{River Soar.}
